response.original_title: Chhota Bheem Maha Shaitaan Ka Mahayudh
response.overview: Shaitaan has acquired the powers of all five chakras and has become this ultimate powerful entity that can destroy anything but he can't be too sure of his victory in this universe as a small portion of Chakras went to the chakravees who can destroy Shaitaan so he decides to transport the entire earth into a different dark dimension where Chakravees can't reach. So, Shaitaan sends his four maha villains to create havoc on earth who capture various kingdoms, including Dholakpur.King Inderaverma tells kids that they must travel to Devpur and find Chakrapashus who have the powers of Chakras, with their help Chakras were created in the first place but kids must pass the test to become ultimate Chakra warriors. Kids are on a mission but Zuhu and Damyaan attack them, they somehow manage to reach Devpur, where they meet Kanha disguised as Shamanra who guides them to get their powers form four adbhud Chakra Pashus. In the final face-off kids defeat Shaitaan and save the earth.
response.title: Chhota Bheem MahaShaitaan Ka Mahayudh
